page.title: 06Flookburgh Cooperative
page.content:
{Flookburgh Cooperative}is a group of local fishermen working together to have their catches processed and then distributed across the country.
Three main products are involved, shrimps, cockles and whitebait. The shrimps are cleaned, cooked in butter and spices, and then weighed in to tubs.Each tub is sealed with butter and frozen,ready to be delivered. The products are sent all over the country and they are very popular.
There is a staff of six, including the manager and three ladies who process the catches. One lady has been with the Cooperative for 23 years.
